text: Jisas kru 12 vat kandɨhaŋɨnɨŋ sɨmbɨta nɨmavami, Krunavundi muvundumuvundu kɨnduyɨ maŋumara. Samariandu pɨhu aruruyɨ ndahara maŋindɨhumara.10.5 Matyundu aŋgwɨmɨkɨyɨ kuyu kutaŋguta kumanzɨpi timu tɨŋgɨruramata ambavarami hañɨndu muhanda nɨ. Kuyu kanɨŋandɨhin Matyu 10.5-42yɨ kɨyɨ. Jisasɨndu sɨmbɨrasara krunavundiŋ Gotɨndu kuyu ambavarɨrɨmɨtu nurɨŋ muhɨmɨmuhɨm vana yɨvurahɨrɨmandɨrɨm ambami.
